text: The Iulia Hasdeu National College () is a high school located in the east part of Bucharest, Romania, right at the crossroad of Ferdinand I Boulevard and Mihai Bravu Highway. It is one of the most prestigious secondary education institutions in Bucharest. It was named after poet Iulia Hasdeu. == Photos == == See also == * Iulia Hasdeu == External links == * Official site Category:High schools in Bucharest Category:National Colleges in Romania
title: Iulia Hasdeu National College (Bucharest)
